name: Bloody Praise
description:
Oh, these cultists. So tired of those 200 of 'em in my city! How can they be so miserable and foolish to believe that the Greatest Old One will hear them? You surely know how to better show praises...

Bloody Praise is a small, short, fast-paced shooter with cute graphics and a weird plot. Your goal is to survive and defeat the horde of Cthulhu cultists. What's the catch? Find out for yourself!

Developed in under 7 days for Week 182 of Weekly Game Jam.

P.S.: My big apologies for the first (release) version being very raw. I could have done it better; however, the game on release lacked a lot of polish and some very important peculiarities.
